text: Would you like to donate some of your earnings to the charity Save the Children?
Yes, I would be willing to donate a fraction of my earnings to Save the Children.
How much of the $2 payment for this task would you like to donate?
I would be okay with donating $0.10 from the task payment towards the charity.
Sounds good. It will (supposedly) be directly taken from your payment and donated to the charity.
Okay. What does the charity do/what are my funds going to be used for?
They promote children's rights, provide relief, and support kids in developing countries. More information can be found at  URL
Interesting. Do you know about any of their recent projects?

In 2017 they sent health experts to the Malawi to resuscitate and care for babies with low birth weight. 379,000 babies were cared for by these experts, and 19,000 of them had been successfully resuscitated.
That's very impressive, I am glad that I am donating this charity now that I know more about them.
Right? They seem like a good charity. Thank you for your donation!
Thank you for your time, and for the opportunity.
You're very welcome! Thank you for chatting with me.
You're welcome! Thank you also.
I hope you have a nice day! Are you planning anything exciting this week?
Besides working in the morning, I plan to go out to a concert with a few friends on Saturday, so that should be fun.
Ooh nice. I hope you have a nice time! I don't really have anything planned this week yet.
That's fine. I hope you still have a good week! I didn't really do that much last week, but it was still relaxing.
I'm glad you had a relaxing week! And thank you, I'm sure this week will be relaxing for me as well.
I hope you enjoy! Thanks again for chatting with me.
